courseTopicDescription: What topic do you want to learn? Be as specific or broad as you like.
topicPlaceholder: e.g., Differential Geometry, Linear Algebra, Real Analysis
descriptionPlaceholder: Describe any specific aspects you want to focus on, your current level, or goals...
courseConfigDescription: Set the difficulty level and number of lessons. Leave lesson count empty to let the AI suggest an optimal structure.
beginnerDescription: No prior knowledge assumed. Builds from the ground up with extra intuition and examples.
intermediateDescription: Assumes familiarity with foundational concepts. Covers core theory with proofs and applications.
advancedDescription: Assumes strong background. Focuses on rigorous proofs, abstractions, and advanced applications.
lessonCountNote: The AI will design a lesson dependency graph - not all lessons are sequential. Some can be studied in parallel.
